revised_title: A Surgical Method to Treat Deafness Caused by Obstruction of the Eustachian Tube
tldr: The author proposes a surgical method to restore hearing when deafness is caused by an obstruction of the Eustachian tube. The method involves using a probe to clear the blockage, and in some cases, injecting the tube with liquid to remove congealed mucus. The author shares several successful case studies to support the effectiveness of this treatment.
